attributes.action: Empower the police to handcuff  violent drunks to lamposts until sober and then fine
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In order to make our towns and Cities places of accessibility at all times to all our law abiding citizens,who have largely had to retreat from them after dark in the face of perceived and actual violence by drunks,please empower the police and judiciary  to detain at the site of the of the disturbance of the peace be it due to drunken incapability,drunken aggression,drunken violence.The offender to be handcuffed and shackled to the nearest lampost,provided with a space blanket,observed by 2 officers in a video van,who are first aid trained,and protected by a further 2 police dog handlers.The offenders should be breathalyzed until they achieve sobriety and then released from the tethering point,in handcuffs and escorted to their homes by the police and bailiffs,where if upon the inability to pay a fine of £1,000,the bailiff should be able to confiscate goods which are perceived as of saleable quality.With the inability to neither pay the fine or have sufficient equity in goods,the offender should be charged with the appropriate offence and duly appear in court.
